name: Stellar Interface
description: Run through the universe in this rogue-like-ish space-shooter. Discover the numerous perks/consumables and their synergistic effects. Explore the randomly-generated galaxy to find merchants, unlock spacecrafts, collect Cartridges and checkmark your kills of the various galactic overlords.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core CPU 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8000, ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series, Intel HD Graphics 3000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 900 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 900 MB available space
